body_html:
@whchung looks like it is proving to be too difficult to get everything in this change to work all at once.
I propose breaking this up this way:

1 - only the toolchains in third_party/gpus/rocm*
2 - tensorflow.bzl changes
3 - BUILD file changes
4 - configure and bazel.rc changes
5 - Dockerfile.rocm
6 - build script changes.

it will be 6 PRs, but they will be much easier to work with to get our CI green for both you and us.

body:
@whchung looks like it is proving to be too difficult to get everything in this change to work all at once.
I propose breaking this up this way:

1 - only the toolchains in third_party/gpus/rocm*
2 - tensorflow.bzl changes
3 - BUILD file changes
4 - configure and bazel.rc changes
5 - Dockerfile.rocm
6 - build script changes.

it will be 6 PRs, but they will be much easier to work with to get our CI green for both you and us.
